ActJudges Act
SubjectNational Judicial Study Leave Fellowship Program ** Leave **
PrecisOrder granting a LEAVE OF ABSENCE to six judges from September 1, 2015 to April 30, 2016 to participate in the NATIONAL JUDICIAL STUDY LEAVE FELLOWSHIP PROGRAM.
